name: The Strayed
summary:
The Strayed is a classic old school side scrolling platformer with an original storyline, containing over 30 levels. This game is still in early access. 
 
Main hero must find his way through the island, encountering dark caves, a temple, and some of the ugliest critters on the face of the Earth. There are many secrets and mysteries to be solved, and many coins and ancient artifacts to discover.
